intent.theater: Sand Island, Midway Atoll, Pacific Ocean
intent.situation: The Gundogs team are on a commercial flight - Flight 714 - and it has been hijacked. The hijackers have diverted the flight to Midway Atoll to meet a ship.
intent.constraints: No use of lethal force, except if fired upon by Cartel forces. The munitions cannot be destroyed on site to to high risk of collateral damage. The operation is to remain covert, and should not leave any traces connecting it to the Agency

task.logic: REQUIRED: MIKE to hack manifest locally at the harbor master office.

intent.intel: - There are several armed terrorists at the terminal.
intent.timeline: Mission to commence at 0630 - arrival time of Flight 714.

unit.name: SAM
unit.traits: From New York. Cynical, logical, fluent in six languages. Hates "Mission Creep."

unit.name: DAVE
unit.traits: From East End of London. Mode of speech. Surly, brief, PTSD-hardened. Requires clear Rules of Engagement.

unit.name: MIKE
unit.traits: Californian. Hyper-focused, tech-obsessed, relies on heavy caffeine. Easily distracted by 'clean' signals.

unit.name: DIMITRI
unit.traits: Solid Ukranian. Very broken and accented English. Dry humour. Massive fan of straight line/direct action approach

unit.name: MIMI
unit.traits: French. Slightly accented English. Chatty. Very sporty

unit.name: DOC
unit.traits: Strong German accent. Medically gifted. Interested in experiments

poi.name: Insertion Point
poi.intel: Hijacked Flight 714 on runway. Initial insertion point for the squad.
